nbdev_cards
================

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

A deck of cards demo of [nbdev](https://nbdev.fast.ai) based on ideas
from [Think Python 2nd
Edition](https://greenteapress.com/wp/think-python-2e/) by Allen B.
Downey

## Install

Install using:

        pip install nbdev_cards
        

OR

        conda install -c fastai nbdev_cards

## How to use

This lib provides a
[Card](https://ganesh3.github.io/nbdev-cards/nbdev_cards\card.html#card)
class that you can use to create, display, and compare playing cards:

``` python
Card(1, 3)
```

    3 ♠

Suits are numbered according to this list:

``` python
suits
```

    ['♣', '♠', '♦', '♥']
